about_the_game:
Gearbits: Raider expedition is an expansion campaign for Gearbits. The campaign is a side-story, taking place after the end of Gearbits. The expansion features new missions and maps. A new cast of characters and new playable units.

The giant insects menacing Ourant have been exterminated and peace has returned to the planet. With no more bugs to fear, raiders and salvagers are racing to the remote regions of the planet to reclaim any scrap and valuables left behind when the bugs attacked. A small crew of salvagers makes an unusual discovery, when they find the sentient navigational computer of a crashed spaceship. The computer awakens and asks the crew for help in locating valuable parts of the crashed ship. Aided by the computer, the crew embarks on a quest that takes them to the remote regions of the planet, where they must fight a group of suspiciously well armed mercenaries and the mysteriously re-emerging giant insects.

10 new story missions

The expansion features 10 new story missions. Featuring new scenarios and a new cast of characters.

New playable units

The expansion adds new robots to pilot. Agile but unwieldy, the new units are designed to give veteran players a new experience.

New maps

The campaign takes place across new maps unique to the expansion. The new maps are playable in the wave battle mode as well.
